patthana23.23:1.1: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana23.23:2.1: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.23:3.1: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
